discovery_notes.What manual work takes up most of your t: Honestly? Copying data between our CRM and billing system. Takes 2-3 hours daily.
discovery_notes.How many hours per week are spent on rep: I'd estimate 30-40 hours across the team. Maybe more.
discovery_notes.What happens if this work doesn't get do: Clients churn. They expect these reports weekly. No report = no renewal.
discovery_notes.Have you tried automation before? What h: Looked at some tools but couldn't justify the cost without proof it would work.
discovery_notes.What's the cost of continuing manually?: We're hiring a 3rd person for this next quarter. That's $60k+ annually.
